title: Banned for This?
body:
Maybe the site crash and the game not working is Karma....  This system has completely gone to shit, this is unreal.  This was me responding to the human after they tried to explain why I deserved a ban because I did not agree with the blitzbot.  At the bottom is my minimal chat log due to me muting the player that was afking and inting.  

I completely disagree, unless you were in the game playing or watched the entire match with what was being said and going on you have no clue what you're seeing in that chat.  The majority of the Red Highlighted areas you have marked were directed to my other teammates that were being ripped on by this guy as well, how are you going to tell me it was all directed at the inter that caused us to lose the game and wasted several people's time.  That joker should be banned and RIOT needs to get a better system if I can be banned from the chat log that was sent to me.  With that being said the only negative thing in that chat to that player was "you're a joker" and after that, I tried to tell him we have a chance to win and explained his champion to him.  Nothing else on this chat was putting anyone down we were all messing around and most of that was back and forth with my Support who was getting completely ripped on and he agreed with everything I was saying including him picking Teemo hoping someone would dodge so he didn't have to play with the Nasus that had inted in his other game prior to this one!  

I want someone else to look into this, I do not deserve any kind of ban/restriction or honor loss what so ever  This game needs to be completely watched from my end!  This a bull shit system that needs to be rehashed completely, which I'm sure you already know because I've been asked for my opinion and taken surveys on the terrible blitzbot system and so have my sons and friends.  So tired of this game's garbage system and then support that tried to explain things nicely but have no idea what the chat's meaning even was.  

**
**Please explain the chat below and point out where and why I should be chat banned.  I've worked my fuckin ass off to get back my honor and this bull shit is taking it away?

Pre Game Lobby:
    Aza80: lol -  THIS WARRANTS A BAN?  
    Aza80: complain about nasus jg and get 3 hit by draven -  THIS WARRANTS A BAN?  


In Game:
    Aza80: I can't even auto  - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: LOL - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: You can't push a fuckin  5/0 draven that can 3 shot all of us - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: wtf ni barrels? - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED

    Aza80: np - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    't believe you' - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: easdy /mute all - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: he was hoping someone would dodge and i should have - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: teemo vs draven leo is death no mater what lol - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: oh well - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED 
    Aza80: just report nasus for inting - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: sitting doing nothing but whining - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: lol you're a joke man all you been doing is whining and bitching - THIS WARRANTS A BAN?
    Aza80: we are losing because of you - THIS WARRANTS A BAN?
    Aza80: you realize you're a hyper carry with extreme tower crushing but you rather type and whine - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED I WAS EXPLAINING TO HIM WHAT HIS CHAMP WAS SO THAT HE WOULD ACTUALLY HELP US WIN THE GAME!
    Aza80: good hope you get banned - THIS WARRANTS A BAN?
    Aza80: 3 reports he get s flagged and can be banned - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: They are actually giving us a chance to win lol - NO CLUE WHY THIS IS FLAGGED
    Aza80: oh i know he's muted, blocked and reported - _**RESPONDING TO 3 OTHER PEOPLE ON THE OTHER TEAM THAT THOUGHT HE SHOULD BE REPORTED FOR AFKING AND NOT HELPING THIS WARRANTS A BAN?**
**

After that they sent me this and I explained yet again.  Oddly enough if the guy just used one ult in the game before it was over we would have won the game because one of the enemy teams players AFK'd as well!

Again nothing there stands out to me, I'll post this on the boards and probably get banned again but at least the community will see how pathetic the system has become.  Why have a human interact if they don't actually do something a bot can't do?  

The bot system failed due to its poor implementation and misinterpreted everything which is why I requested a human.   Is myself using the word "whining" instead of the word "complaining" the cause?  Because I barely speak to anyone in games and typically /mute all  

This is what really stands out to me.
Aza80: just report nasus for inting - _**explaining to my team what to do because they were all complaining and I also told them to just mute him while he continued to rip on everyone.**_ 
Aza80: sitting doing nothing but whining - _**Responding to him saying "we lost our team sucks" etc.......... again explaining WHY WE WERE LOSING if you included all of the chat you would know what the response was for**_ 
Aza80: lol you're a joke man all you been doing is whining and bitching - _**Maybe I could have held back and not said this, but if you saw what he was saying to everyone on the team it was warranted and that didn't cause anyone to lose the game**_
Aza80: we are losing because of you - _**A response to him explaining why we were losing after the entire team told him that he needed to come help and not sit in the jg, I explained to him we still had a chance to win and we were losing because of his actions!**_
Aza80: you realize you're a hyper carry with extreme tower crushing but you rather type and whine  - _**This is explaining his champion to him so that he would actually come help and realize that the game was NOT lost because he was complaining the entire time about how we already lost.**_

The only chat messages included in your chat log are your own for a single, extremely good reason: they are the only ones taken into account for your punishment, because they're the only ones in your control. The things other players said and did in your match might produce in you an impulse to do certain things that may include breaking LoL's rules, but your behavior is your own, and you are responsible for it. If you really think about it, this is a good thing. If a toxic player's goading could exempt you from punishment for your flaming them, calling for reports, etc., then it would logically go the other way as well, resulting in punishments for players who didn't necessarily break any rules but weren't quite as friendly and positive as their teammates. Can you imagine a world where "didn't participate in the dance party and ignored all of our jokes" was a valid report that could get someone suspended for two weeks? We don't want that situation anymore than we want "called our support a braindead waste of space" to be considered an _invalid_ report just because, say, the support was telling their team to harm themselves while they merrily ran it down mid.

Okay thanks for being understanding about it. Glad we could clear that up. I hate to be all lecturey but I just wanna bring one last thing up after going through the thread.

You seem to think that anyone who defends anything Riot does, is just a "fanboy". Now, that implies that there is no reasoning behind their defense. They are just doing it because they have a hard on for Riot for whatever reason. This is more of that shit that I hate. I hope you don't mind if I just give you some reasoning behind Riots rules, so that you can perhaps better understand it. Please dont take this as condescending in any way, Im gonna lay things out just for the sake of clarity and seeing how my mind connects everything and my logic. I dont mean to imply that you arent already aware of any of this.


So, Riot is a business operating under capitalism. Their goal is profit. More power to em, I say. Capitalism is great. So when you have a game with a reputation as being very toxic, it scares away potential players. Also, you get many players who quit the game because theyre sick of being flamed all the damn time. (Ive seen threads of "I quit, so fucking sick of being flamed blah blah" for example) Obviously, this is bad for their bottom line. They want the largest playerbase possible.

So then they implement a tribunal system where players can vote who gets punished for what. This tribunal system ends up being way too slow. The load of cases is just too much for the volunteers of the tribunal, not to mention issues that I would hate, such as players being able to judge my actions through their own filter of life experience and morality, but thats just me, I dont think Riot specifically had an issue with that. I just dont trust people to judge others like that semi-anonymously. 

So Riot scraps that. They make an automated system that works so much faster, and with technology being the way it is, its very accurate. They base the parameters of this automated system mostly on results of the tribunal. If most players voted to punish a behavior, they make that behavior punishable in the automated system. So its the PEOPLE that created the standard, in a way, not Riot. Riot just implemented the system. 

Now, I would never support any restrictions on speech in real life. But the rules of this game exist only in the vacuum of the game. They are not a moral code, or life lesson. They are simply there to deter any toxicity, and increase potential profit for Riot. Im so sick of people looking at it like theyre forcing some kind of morality on us. They arent. Theyre trying to deter people from flaming, for the sake of profit/playerbase. The rules do not apply to real life. 

I hope this kinda helps you understand where at least some people are coming from, when they defend the system. I could care less about Riot. I play starcraft 2 way more than league. If league died tomorrow, I wouldnt feel a thing... unlike when Marvel Heroes shut down cuz that company went bankrupt... god i miss that game. So I have no reason to defend Riot specifically. I defend logic and reason, or at least try to.

You dont change people's minds with insults. Never open a discussion with an insult. I guarantee the other side will only dig their toes in the sand even more. So just calling people fanboys serves no positive purpose. It doesnt help sway opinion, its irrational, and only makes you come off as unreasonable and unwilling to actually consider that they may have a valid reason. Everything is about understanding. It took me like 30 years to realize this. We need to understand eachother. Not pick a side and just ignore anything the other side says.  Sorry if that came off like I'm lecturing you. You just seem like a reasonable person and I hope this opens your mind a little. 

And I totally understand the whole hypocrisy of telling you to reform and what not. I hate that term reform, just because of the implication of some kind of righteous morality. But reform in the context of league, simply means falling in line of their rules. Reforming yourself to follow their rules.
